nodes.text: BSO 401.72 was the local radio station for Black Spire Outpost on the Outer Rim planet Batuu. It broadcast droid battles from nearby Galma, as well as dejarik tournaments, podraces, and popular music from around the galaxy.
BSO 401.72 was introduced as a background audio loop used in various locations throughout Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge, a theme park land that first opened to guests at Disneyland Park on May 31, 2019.
